summary: Poor girl attends the elite Shin Hwa High and is bullied by the leader of F4 (the four richest boys). He becomes attracted to her; however, she has a crush on his best friend. Whom will she choose?
cast: Ku Hye-Sun|Lee Min-Ho|Kim Hyun-joong|Kim Bum|Kim Joon|Kim So-eun|Im Ye-jin|Lee Hye-yeong|Park Ji-bin|Jeong Ho-bin|Ahn Suk-hwan|Song Seok-ho|Kim Gi-Bang|Lee Jeong-kil|Gook Ji-yun|Jang Ja-yun|Min Young-won|Kim Hyun-joo|Lee Min-Jung|Won Wang|Park Soo-Jin|Lee Si-young|Kim Young-ok|Ee-cheol Jeong|Kyung-Hwan Heo|Chae-Young Han|Jong-jin Kim|Kyu-jong Kim|Min-ji Kim|Yong Ho Kim|Jong-rye Won|Nam Da-Reum|Ming Hai|Jung-Joon Lee|Ju-hwan Lim|Kyung Kyu Park|Sang-Gyu Park|Young-saeng Heo|Hyung-joon Kim|Yigeumhui|Hyung-Jun Kim|ChelseaDiamond Green|Soo-bin Jo|Hae-woo Lee|Jung-sung Lee|Suk-koo Lee
